about_the_game:
This Tea Temple Pack includes 43 furniture items, 11 clothing items, 4 wigs, 1 mount, and 2 pets.

If you have dreams of living on a Japan-themed farm, then this is the pack for you! The Tea Table Pack has 63 Japan-inspired outfits and furniture items available for you to customize your characters and decorate your homes, sheds, and farms.

Pack includes:
  • Tea Table Furniture Set: Green Runner Tea Table, Yellow Runner Tea Low Table, Yellow Runner Tea Table, Delicious Bento Box, Yummy Bento Box, Cluttered Study Desk, Organized Study Desk, Black Display Katana, Green Display Katana, Blue Display Katana, Sakura Floral End Table, Bonsai End Table, Paper Lantern End Table, Extravagant Bamboo Wardrobe, Koi Pond Rug, Used Tatami Mat Rug, New Tatami Mat Rug, Sakura Screen Divider, Daisy Screen Divider, Sakura Print Bed, Lacquered Wood Bed, Green Tea Chair, Red Tea Chair, Blue Tea Cushion, Yellow Tea Chair, Checkered Stacked Storage Shelves, Stacked Storage Shelves, Checkered Stacked Storage Dresser, Traditional Shrine Lantern, Bonsai Lantern, New Lovers Lantern, Used Lovers Lantern, Pink Tea Floor Cushion, Green Tea Floor Cushion, Mini Tea Yellow Floor Cushion, Simple Kotatsu, Simple White Tea Pot, Sakura Tea Pot, Simple Black Tea Pot, Ornate Black Tea Pot, Tidy Temple Wardrobe, and Cluttered Temple Wardrobe
  • Kanmuri Outfit Set: Kanmuri Wig, Traditional Yukata, and Traditional Hakama
  • Kanzashi Outfit Set: High Kanzashi Bun Wig, Twin Kanzashi Bun Wig, Teal Kimono, Jet Black Kimono, and Black Kimono Shoes
  • Tengu Outfit Set: Tengu Helmet, Tengu Shirt, Tengu Pants, and Tengu Wings
  • Temple Spirit Outfit Set: Temple Spirit Wig, Temple Spirit Robe, and Temple Spirit Sleeves
  • Tanuki Mount
  • Kappo, the Kappa Pet
  • Yoki, the Yokai Pet
